title: neeku thanaku
sahitya:
nIku tanaku ruNa bhAvamu lEdanEdaru



anupallavi



 lEka nIkE dayalEdO shrI rAma



caraNam 1



 cinna nADAdiga cittamandu nelakona vADavE nA kOrika sAgakuNTE 

   

caraNam 2



 karagi karagi pAda kamalamandu vrAla karuNintunani nApai kanneDa jEsitE

   

caraNam 3



 I janmamuna nAdu pUjala gaikoni rAjillu shrI tyAgarAjuni maracitE
